# fit model
model = ARIMA(series, order=(5,1,0))
model_fit = model.fit(disp=0)

# plot residual errors
residuals = DataFrame(model_fit.resid)
residuals.plot()
pyplot.show()
residuals.plot(kind='kde')
pyplot.show()
print(residuals.describe())
